extendedInfo.description: Experience the most stylish Holo light and dark Android calendar app with 6 powerful views and 5 beautiful widgets.Â Nominationsâ #5 spot in Android Headlines: Top 10 Best Android Apps â June 2013 â #4 spot in Android Authority: The Best Android Widgets! â May 2013  Â Recommendationsâ âDigiCal is beautiful, functional, and wrapped in an easy to read, clean design.â Holo Everywhereâ âDigiCal takes it to the next level with some really nice enhancementsâ - Talk Androidâ âThe widgets are really fantastic and work brilliantly on phones with HD displays.â â Android HeadlinesÂ â Sync with all calendarsDigiCal is a stylish and user friendly calendar app that syncs all your appointment with Google Calendar, Outlook and Exchange. Â âª 6 powerful and stylish calendar viewsChoose from the day, week, agenda, month, text month and list view in portrait and landscape mode. Â âª 5 stunning and functional widgets  Make use of the fully customizable list, grid, day, day list and month widgets.Â âª Android Holo light and dark theme The clean and intuitive user interface is available for smartphones and tablets running Android 2.2+.Â â Unique built-in location search Adding a location to your appointment has never been easier. All you need to do is type in the name of the place (cafe, store, and park) and DigiCal will look up the address and save it. Â â Integration with Google Now Google Now (Android 4.1+) will know where you'll need to go, if youâve saved the location. It'll watch current traffic, plan your route and notify you when you should leave.Â  â Improved notificationsOur notifications are upgraded with shortcuts for snooze, maps and navigation.Â âSmart action barThe smart action bar makes it quick and easy to edit, move, copy, paste and delete events.Â  â¤ Translated in 21 languagesThanks to the hard work of our volunteers DigiCal is now translated into 21 languages. If you find a mistake, please let us know.Â  Key features:â Stylish and intuitive user interface in Holo dark and light theme â 6 unique calendar views (day, week, agenda, month, text month and list)â 5 beautiful and fully customizable widgets (list, grid, day, day list and month) â Built-in location search for quickly adding locations to your eventsâ Google Now (Android 4.1+) support, notifying you when it's time to leave by planning your route, checking traffic and calculating your travel timeâ Improved notifications with shortcuts for snooze, map and navigationâ Smart action bar for quick editing, moving, copying, pasting and deleting eventsâ Event pop-up makes it easy to go through your individual eventsâ Gestures like pinch to zoom and swipe to navigate are supportedâ Fully compatible with Android 2.2+Â DigiCal+ Premium features: â Beautiful month widgetâ Extra widget configuration options: background transparency and custom font sizesâ Color picker: custom background and text color for the day, day list, list, grid and month widgetsâ Ads freeÂ   â Do you need help or want to give us some feedback, feel free to contact us at digical@digibites.nl.Â âº For tutorials and FAQ, please visit our support page: https://digibites.zendesk.com.

reviews.title: I\'ve tried them all...
reviews.comment: .... for me, this is the clear winner.  The widget is stunning in Day List mode, and the functionality of the calendar is superb.  It syncs much faster than other calendars I\'ve used.  I haven\'t even gotten around to exploring all the features, such as Google Now integration, but it\'s already my favorite calendar.
reviews.author: Jim Friedlander

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Only one thing. It could be nice if you can add  yearly events like fourth Thursday of November, second Sunday of may, etc. Thanks
reviews.author: Jorge Vizcaino

reviews.title: Functional and complete
reviews.comment: I tried only a couple calendar apps before choosing to stay with Digical. It allows a lot of functionality, reminder options and is pleasant to look at.
reviews.author: John Hazlett

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: This is the best calendar app I have ever used.  Only one tiny little flaw is that it takes a little to long sometimes to sync between google and other device.
reviews.author: Richard Yeager

reviews.title: Best
reviews.comment: I tried Samsung S planner, aCalendar & others, and prefer Digical. Love faded past events, super flexible repetitions, excellent Agenda view, widgets (I use 6 and 15 day). I don\'t use their reminders/popups, I use Calendar Event Reminder which gives more flexibility for snoozes. And they are very responsive: fixed an Exchange problem in 2 days.
reviews.author: victor zlotnicki

reviews.title: Access Microsoft & Google calendars in one place
reviews.comment: I switched to DigiCal because it was the only Android calendar app I found that lets you view your microsoft & google calendars together.  Now, there\'s no more switching from one website to another to cross-check your calendars!
reviews.author: Kristy GH

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: 1 star missing because of only 2 color choices for background and it does not have a 4x2 size widget on my GS3 where I can put it right on my default home page like the HTC calendar.  Other than I\'m very satisfied.
reviews.author: Mae mutuc

reviews.title: Practical, adaptable app with great widgets
reviews.comment: This is really worth buying. Developers are responsive and effective.
reviews.author: Hylton Gudmanz

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: The best month view I\'ve found. Highly configurable with a cool looking interface.
reviews.author: Enrico B. da Luz

reviews.title: Awesome app!
reviews.comment: I love how customizable and beautiful the application is. It\'s also very easy to create and edit appointments.
reviews.author: Xavier Hudson

reviews.title: Very clean
reviews.comment: Text month very useful, and now refreshes instantly. Great looking widgets. Control of width would be useful. Bit tight to edge on One X. 3 or 4 days ahead alert would be useful.
reviews.author: Bruce Clarke

reviews.title: Great calendar
reviews.comment: I use the month view all the time! I love it!
reviews.author: Lan Bui

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: This is the way to go. Would be perfect without the recurring \"rate the app\" notice.
reviews.author: Eelis Peltola

reviews.title: Digicalendar
reviews.comment: Won\'t let me add events \"please make sure there is at least one writable calendar\" I don\'t have a calendar to sync. I want to make a calendar that\'s why I downloaded this
reviews.author: Kari Nicole
